it is 3 disc images. cd key generator. and no-cd crack.  but i uploaded it to you guys as a .rar file. so you must unrar it and then you will see all the other files.  so, mount the 1st image and install. when asked for the 2nd disc, you must mount it in place of the 1st image and click ok. repeat the step for disc 3.  this game works perfect for me.

barkerBrig12,

in order 4 the crack 2 work you must copy the w40k.exe (located in the crack folder) into the directory in which u installed the game. it will ask you if you want 2 replace the w40k.exe file. click yes. then double click the new w40k.exe
everyone, all you need to run this game is included. i had no problems, as is.  i still play this game with no problem! :)
